original: @224b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @224b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya ma h'a pra ti s'a r'a yee bidy'a bi dhi n'a ma /
analyzed: a'arya ma h'a pra ti s'a r'a yee bidy'a bi dhi n'a ma /
translated: Ārya-Mahāpratisarāvidhi-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i rig pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
analyzed: 'phags ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i rig pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
translated: The Ritual of the Knowledge of the Noble Great Amulet, called The Procedure

original: 'phags ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Noble Great Amulet!🔽I will write its wheel

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon dga' ba'i //🔽phyag 'tshal so sor 'brang ma bshad //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon dga' ba'i // phyag 'tshal so sor 'brang ma bshad //
translated: for the delight of all the buddhas

original: sems can thams cad rnam 'byung ba'i //🔽de yi 'khor lo bdag gis bri //
analyzed: sems can thams cad rnam 'byung ba'i // de yi 'khor lo bdag gis bri //
translated: and for the liberation of all beings.

original: gtsang ma mnyam par gzhag cing gtor ma la sogs byin la /
analyzed: gtsang ma mnyam par gzhag cing gtor ma la sogs byin la /
translated: One should be pure, equipoised, and offer sacrificial offerings, and so forth.

original: bskum khru gang gi tshad kyi gro ga'am ras la sogs pa'i gzhi la /
analyzed: bskum khru gang gi tshad kyi gro ga'am ras la sogs pa'i gzhi la /
translated: On a base of birch bark or cloth, one cubit in size,

original: dang po re zhig sor bzhi'i tshad kyi rim pa gcig bri'o //
analyzed: dang po re zhig sor bzhi'i tshad kyi rim pa gcig bri'o //
translated: first draw a square measuring four finger breadths.

original: de'i dbus su zla tshes thig les brgyan pa'i h'um brgyad kyis bskor ba'i pram yig go //
analyzed: de'i dbus su zla tshes thig les brgyan pa'i h'um brgyad kyis bskor ba'i pram yig go //
translated: In the center, the syllable praṃ, surrounded by eight hūṃs, adorned with crescent moons and drops.

original: de'i nang du sngags /
analyzed: de'i nang du sngags /
translated: In its center, the mantra:

original: aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra ti s'a re dha re kasyam raksham ku ru sh'anti pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra ti s'a re dha re kasyam raksham ku ru sh'anti pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ maṇidhari vajrī mahāprati-sāre dhāraka kṣaṃ rakṣaṃ kuru śānti-puṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: de'i phyir sor phyed kyi rim pa gnyis la /
analyzed: de'i phyir sor phyed kyi rim pa gnyis la /
translated: Then, on the second half-finger-width level,

original: de la dang po rim pa gcig gi sngags ni /
analyzed: de la dang po rim pa gcig gi sngags ni /
translated: the mantra on the first level is:

original: aom ma ni zhes pa sngar gyi gcig go //
analyzed: aom ma ni zhes pa sngar gyi gcig go //
translated: Oṃ maṇi as before.

original: gnyis ba ni de ltar rim par bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis ba ni de ltar rim par bya'o //
translated: The second is like that.

original: de'i phyi rol du sor gsum gyi rim pa gcig go //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du sor gsum gyi rim pa gcig go //
translated: Outside of that, there is one level three finger-widths wide.

original: de la phyogs bzhir ri mo gnyis pa padma 'dab ma bzhi pa'i mdun la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi rim par ri mo gnyis kyi mtshams su sngags ni /
analyzed: de la phyogs bzhir ri mo gnyis pa padma 'dab ma bzhi pa'i mdun la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi rim par ri mo gnyis kyi mtshams su sngags ni /
translated: On that, in the four directions, there are two lines, and in the four directions of the four-petaled lotus, in the spaces between the two lines, the mantra is:

original: @225a * // aom bi ma le bi pu le dza ya ba re aa mri te dha ra raksha sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: @225a * // aom bi ma le bi pu le dza ya ba re aa mri te dha ra raksha sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vimalavipule jayavare amṛte dhāra rakṣa śānti-puṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: g-yas su aom aa mri te bi lo ki ni garbha sam raksha ni a'a karsha ni dha ra ra ka sya raksha sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: g-yas su aom aa mri te bi lo ki ni garbha sam raksha ni a'a karsha ni dha ra ra ka sya raksha sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: On the right: Oṃ amṛte vilokinī garbha saṃrakṣaṇi ākarṣaṇi dhāra rakṣa śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: rgyab tu / aom bh'a ra bh'a ra /
analyzed: rgyab tu / aom bh'a ra bh'a ra /
translated: On the back: Oṃ bhāra bhāra

original: sam bh'a ra sam bh'a ra /
analyzed: sam bh'a ra sam bh'a ra /
translated: saṃbhāra saṃbhāra

original: aindr'i ya ba la bi sho dha ni dha ra ka sya raksham sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aindr'i ya ba la bi sho dha ni dha ra ka sya raksham sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: indrāya balaviśodhani dhāra rakṣa śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: g-yon du aom aa mri ta ba re ba ra ba ra pra ba ra bi shuddhe ra ka sya raksha sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'am h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: g-yon du aom aa mri ta ba re ba ra ba ra pra ba ra bi shuddhe ra ka sya raksha sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'am h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: On the left: Oṃ amṛtavare varavara pravara viśuddhe rakṣa śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: 'dab ma rnams kyi dbus su h'um yig brgyad kyis bskor ba'i pram yig gi nang du /
analyzed: 'dab ma rnams kyi dbus su h'um yig brgyad kyis bskor ba'i pram yig gi nang du /
translated: In the center of the petals, write the eight hūṃ syllables surrounding the syllable praṃ.

original: aom ma ni dhu ri zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags bri bar bya'o ;
analyzed: aom ma ni dhu ri zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags bri bar bya'o ;
translated: In the center of that, write the mantra oṃ maṇi dhruva and so on.

original: / phyogs bral bzhir rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje phyed pa'i nang gi me la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi rim par sngags ni /
analyzed: / phyogs bral bzhir rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje phyed pa'i nang gi me la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi rim par sngags ni /
translated: In the four intermediate directions, write the mantra in the sequence of fire and so on, inside the half-vajras with three prongs.

original: aom bi spho ta badzri ni dha ra ka sya raksha sh'intam pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom bi spho ta badzri ni dha ra ka sya raksha sh'intam pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ viṣphoṭavajriṇidhārakaśya rakṣa śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: bden bral du /
analyzed: bden bral du /
translated: In the southwest:

original: aom aa mri ta b'a re dha ra ka sya raksham sh'antim pushti ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aa mri ta b'a re dha ra ka sya raksham sh'antim pushti ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ amṛtabhāre dhārakaśya rakṣa śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.🔽In the northwest:

original: rlung du / aom bi ma le dha ra ka sya raksham sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: rlung du / aom bi ma le dha ra ka sya raksham sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vimaledhārakaśya rakṣa śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: dbang ldan du /
analyzed: dbang ldan du /
translated: In the northeast:

original: aom dza ya b'a re dha ra ka sya raksham sh'intam pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom dza ya b'a re dha ra ka sya raksham sh'intam pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ jayabhāre dhārakaśya rakṣa śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: padma'i 'dab ma dang rdo rje phyed ma rnams kyi mtshams brgyad rnams su /
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ma dang rdo rje phyed ma rnams kyi mtshams brgyad rnams su /
translated: In the eight intermediate directions of the lotus petals and vajra half-vajras,

original: me'i phyogs kyi rim par sngags ni /
analyzed: me'i phyogs kyi rim par sngags ni /
translated: the mantra in the southeast is:

original: aom sum bha badzri ni dha ra ka sya raksham sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom sum bha badzri ni dha ra ka sya raksham sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ sumbha vajriṇidhārakaśya rakṣa śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: zhes pa'i sngags gnyis sam gcig nang du bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags gnyis sam gcig nang du bri bar bya'o //
translated: Either two or one of these mantras should be written inside.

original: de'i phyi ru sor phyed dang gsum gyi tshad la rim pa bzhi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyi ru sor phyed dang gsum gyi tshad la rim pa bzhi bya'o //
translated: Outside of that, make four steps of half a finger each.

original: de la rim pa dang po la hr'i: yi ge phreng gcig bri'o //
analyzed: de la rim pa dang po la hr'i: yi ge phreng gcig bri'o //
translated: On the first step, write a garland of the syllable HRĪḤ.

original: de'i phyi'i rim pa la /
analyzed: de'i phyi'i rim pa la /
translated: On the second step,🔽write the following mantras:

original: aom aa pa r'a dzi te ma h'a de bi trat /
analyzed: aom aa pa r'a dzi te ma h'a de bi trat /
translated: Oṃ aparājite mahādevī trāt

original: aom k'a la kanda kri ta /
analyzed: aom k'a la kanda kri ta /
translated: Oṃ kālakṛta

original: padma kunda li pam /🔽aom pushpa danti ni h'um /
analyzed: padma kunda li pam / aom pushpa danti ni h'um /
translated: padmanīlīpaṃ🔽Oṃ puṣpadantini hūṃ

original: aom ma lyam ku shi h'um /
analyzed: aom ma lyam ku shi h'um /
translated: Oṃ mañjuśrī hūṃ

original: aom badzra srim kha le h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra srim kha le h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-sṛkhaṃkale hūṃ

original: aom shve te bam /
analyzed: aom shve te bam /
translated: Oṃ śvetā vaṃ🔽Oṃ mahākālī hrīḥ

original: aom ma h'a k'a li hr'i: aom badzra p'a ni he /
analyzed: aom ma h'a k'a li hr'i: aom badzra p'a ni he /
translated: Oṃ vajrapāṇi he

original: aom badzra p'a ni bri ta /🔽aom badzra p'a ni ma h'a ba le dhi:/
analyzed: aom badzra p'a ni bri ta / aom badzra p'a ni ma h'a ba le dhi:/
translated: Oṃ vajrapāṇi bṛta🔽Oṃ vajrapāṇi mahābaledhiḥ

original: aom badzra m'a le mam /🔽aom aa mri ta kunda la sv'a h'a /🔽aom dzva la dzva la h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra m'a le mam / aom aa mri ta kunda la sv'a h'a / aom dzva la dzva la h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajramāle mam🔽Oṃ amṛtakuṇḍali svāhā🔽Oṃ jvala jvala hūṃ phaṭ svāhā

original: aom takki h'um dza: sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom takki h'um dza: sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ takki hūṃ jaḥ svāhā

original: de'i phyi'i rim pa la aom tsundi hr'i:/
analyzed: de'i phyi'i rim pa la aom tsundi hr'i:/
translated: On the third step, write: Oṃ cundī hrīḥ

original: aom surnna ke shi kri ta /🔽aom pim ga le lam /
analyzed: aom surnna ke shi kri ta / aom pim ga le lam /
translated: Oṃ suranikeśa kṛta🔽Oṃ piṅgalā laṃ

original: aom bi dyunm'a li ni dza: h'um /
analyzed: aom bi dyunm'a li ni dza: h'um /
translated: Oṃ vidyunmālini jaḥ hūṃ

original: aom sh'antim ka ri h'um /🔽aom pushtim ba la brta ni ha:/🔽aom sumbha ka ri h'um /🔽aom ma ni dha ri h'um /🔽aom ratna mu ku ta /🔽m'a la dha ri hr'i:/🔽aom ma h'a pra ti sa ri pra /🔽aom dhu ru dhu ru /🔽mu ru mu ru /🔽hu ru hu ru /🔽me ru me ru /🔽h'um h'um / aom ba la bardha ni @225b ho:/🔽aom ru ru tsa le h'um h'um phat phat /🔽aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra ti sa re dh'a ra ka sy'a raksham sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /🔽de'i phyi'i rim par aom ta re t'am a'a:/
analyzed: aom sh'antim ka ri h'um / aom pushtim ba la brta ni ha:/ aom sumbha ka ri h'um / aom ma ni dha ri h'um / aom ratna mu ku ta / m'a la dha ri hr'i:/ aom ma h'a pra ti sa ri pra / aom dhu ru dhu ru / mu ru mu ru / hu ru hu ru / me ru me ru / h'um h'um / aom ba la bardha ni @225b ho:/ aom ru ru tsa le h'um h'um phat phat / aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra ti sa re dh'a ra ka sy'a raksham sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a / de'i phyi'i rim par aom ta re t'am a'a:/
translated: Oṃ śāntikari hūṃ.🔽Oṃ puṣṭim-avardhani hūṃ.🔽Oṃ sumbhakarī hūṃ.🔽Oṃ maṇidhari hūṃ.🔽Oṃ ratnamukuṭa-māladhari hrīḥ.🔽Oṃ mahāpratisarā pra.🔽Oṃ dhuru dhuru.🔽Mururu mururu.🔽Hururu hururu.🔽Meru meru.🔽Hum hum.🔽Oṃ balavardhani hoḥ.🔽Oṃ ruru cale hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ maṇidhari vajrī mahāpratisarā dhāraka-sya rakṣaṃ śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.🔽In the next circle, oṃ tāre tuttāre ture svāhā.🔽

original: aom aom mu aom aa raksha sya ka dza deshtam /🔽aom buddha raksha ti ke he h'um /🔽aom raksha ra kam sarba bha ye byadhi:/🔽aom de b'i shr'i / aom padmo pam /🔽aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni h'um /🔽aom lo tsa ne l'am /🔽aom m'a ma k'i m'am /
analyzed: aom aom mu aom aa raksha sya ka dza deshtam /🔽aom buddha raksha ti ke he h'um /🔽aom raksha ra kam sarba bha ye byadhi:/🔽aom de b'i shr'i / aom padmo pam /🔽aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni h'um /🔽aom lo tsa ne l'am /🔽aom m'a ma k'i m'am /
translated: Oṃ oṃ mu oṃ, protect me!🔽Oṃ, protect me with the Buddha's protection!🔽Oṃ, protect me from all fears!🔽Oṃ, the light of the gods!🔽Oṃ, the lotus!🔽Oṃ, the holder of the jewel!🔽Oṃ, the holder of the lotus!🔽Oṃ, Māmakī!🔽

original: aom panda re pam /
analyzed: aom panda re pam /
translated: Oṃ, to the vajra of the vessel,

original: aom ba su dha re bam /
analyzed: aom ba su dha re bam /
translated: Oṃ, to the vajra of water,

original: aom ku ru kulle hr'i:/🔽aom bhri ku ti bhrim /
analyzed: aom ku ru kulle hr'i:/ aom bhri ku ti bhrim /
translated: Oṃ, to Kurukullā hrīḥ,🔽Oṃ, to Bhṛkuṭī bhrūṃ,

original: aom bhr'um h'um bhr'um aa:/
analyzed: aom bhr'um h'um bhr'um aa:/
translated: Oṃ, to the vajra of the vessel bhrūṃ aḥ.

original: de'i phyi ru song gnyis kyi rim pa gcig bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyi ru song gnyis kyi rim pa gcig bya'o //
translated: Outside of that, make a single layer of two fingerbreadths.

original: der mgo gyen du bstan pa'i rdo rje bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi phreng sku du bri'o //
analyzed: der mgo gyen du bstan pa'i rdo rje bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi phreng sku du bri'o //
translated: There, draw a garland of forty-eight upright vajras.

original: rdo rje gnyis kyi mtshams nub la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi ri ma par /
analyzed: rdo rje gnyis kyi mtshams nub la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi ri ma par /
translated: In the intermediate directions, such as west, draw the syllables

original: lam / ksh'um /
analyzed: lam / ksh'um /
translated: laṃ, kṣūṃ,🔽kaṃ, bhrāṃ, iṃ, bhrūṃ,

original: k'am bhram / aim bhr'um /
analyzed: k'am bhram / aim bhr'um /
translated: haṃ, kṣaḥ,

original: ham ka:/ kham ha:/
analyzed: ham ka:/ kham ha:/
translated: khaṃ, haḥ,🔽pāṃ, jaḥ,

original: p'am dz'a:/ a'am /
analyzed: p'am dz'a:/ a'am /
translated: Pa or ja or a🔽🔽

original: hr'i:/ l'i:/ hr'i:/ pum /
analyzed: hr'i:/ l'i:/ hr'i:/ pum /
translated: hrīḥ, lāṃ, hrīḥ, puṃ,

original: krum / dza:/ dh'i /
analyzed: krum / dza:/ dh'i /
translated: kṣuṃ, jaḥ, dhīḥ,

original: ho bram / h'um a'a:/
analyzed: ho bram / h'um a'a:/
translated: hoḥ, bhrāṃ, hūṃ, aḥ,

original: phat dzam / smam mam /
analyzed: phat dzam / smam mam /
translated: phaṭ, jaṃ, smaṃ, maṃ,

original: kam / bam /
analyzed: kam / bam /
translated: kaṃ, vaṃ,

original: ram / pum /
analyzed: ram / pum /
translated: raṃ, puṃ,

original: trem / bhoom /🔽bham / aom /
analyzed: trem / bhoom / bham / aom /
translated: treṃ, bhoṃ,🔽bhaṃ, oṃ,

original: aa / bham /
analyzed: aa / bham /
translated: aṃ, bhaṃ,

original: ksh'im / dhi he:/🔽dzam / r'um /
analyzed: ksh'im / dhi he:/ dzam / r'um /
translated: kṣīṃ, dhīḥ, heḥ,🔽jaṃ, rāṃ,

original: r'um / aam /
analyzed: r'um / aam /
translated: Rūṃ. Aṃ.

original: sem / ra /🔽de'i phyi ru sor gnyis kyi rim pa gcig gi tshad gcig bya'o //
analyzed: sem / ra /🔽de'i phyi ru sor gnyis kyi rim pa gcig gi tshad gcig bya'o //
translated: seṃ, raṃ.

original: der padma bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi 'dab ma dang ge sar rgyas pa dbyug pa la dar dpyangs bcings pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: der padma bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi 'dab ma dang ge sar rgyas pa dbyug pa la dar dpyangs bcings pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: There, one should draw forty-four lotuses with full-blown petals and pistils, bound with a ribbon on the handle.

original: de'i steng du mtshan ma bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du mtshan ma bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bri bar bya'o //
translated: Above that, one should draw forty-eight signs.

original: 'khor lo dang / ral gri dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / rdo rje dang / tho ba dang / g-yas skor du dung dang / rdo rje dang / rgyal mtshan dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang /
analyzed: 'khor lo dang / ral gri dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / rdo rje dang / tho ba dang / g-yas skor du dung dang / rdo rje dang / rgyal mtshan dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang /
translated: A wheel, a sword, a bow, an arrow, a vajra, a hammer, a right-turning conch, a vajra, a banner, a wish-fulfilling gem, a noose, an axe,

original: rte gsum dang / lcags kyu dang / gdugs dang / padma dang / mdung thung ngo //
analyzed: rte gsum dang / lcags kyu dang / gdugs dang / padma dang / mdung thung ngo //
translated: a trident, a hook, an umbrella, a lotus, and a javelin.

original: de rnams sor gsum gyi sa la bri'o //
analyzed: de rnams sor gsum gyi sa la bri'o //
translated: Those should be drawn three finger-widths apart.

original: yi ge thams cad kyi mgo phyir bstan par bri'o//
analyzed: yi ge thams cad kyi mgo phyir bstan par bri'o//
translated: All the letters should be written with the head facing outward.

original: 'phags ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i rig pa'i cho ga rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i rig pa'i cho ga rdzogs so /
translated: The ritual of the great protection of the noble Tārā is complete.

original: // / rgya gar yul b'a r'a na s'ir pandi ta pu ru shotta ma'i zhal snga nas legs par mnyan te /
analyzed: // / rgya gar yul b'a r'a na s'ir pandi ta pu ru shotta ma'i zhal snga nas legs par mnyan te /
translated: In the Indian country of Vārāṇasī, I listened well to the face of the paṇḍita Puruṣottama.

original: lo ts'a ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos /
analyzed: lo ts'a ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos /
translated: The translator, the monk Nyima Gyaltsen Pal Zangpo,

original: gtsug lag khang chen po thar pa gling du bsgyur b'ao//
analyzed: gtsug lag khang chen po thar pa gling du bsgyur b'ao//
translated: translated this at the great temple of Tarpa Ling.
